text: avane, bhumiyalli nim'mannu pratinidhigalagi kaluhisidavanu mattu nimagenannu nidalagideyo a mulaka nim'mannu pariksisalikkagi nim'malli kelavarige itara kelavariginta unnata sthanagalannu nididavanu. Khanditavagiyu nim'modeyanu ksipravagi siksisuvavanagiddane mattu nis'sandehavagiyu avanu ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
